attributes.action: Create tougher legislation on water companies dumping sewage in the Severn
attributes.additional_details:
Parliaments should pass legislation dedicated to protecting the rivers of the UK, most notably the River Severn, to protect the rivers from harmful sewage and harmful substances. 
They ought to pass legislation to enforce water companies to build more overflow drains and be persecuted for dumping sewage in the rivers.
attributes.background: The Goverment shall put forward tougher legislation on water companies dumping sewage in the rivers of the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635193
